org.icepdf.core.pobjects.annotations

Class Appearance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.annotations.Appearance

  • public class Appearance
extends Object
    An appearance dictionary dictionary entry for N, R or D can be associated with one or more appearance streams. For example a Widget btn annotation can have an /ON an /Off state. This class sill store one or more named appearance streams for a dictionary entry.
    Since:
    5.1

      Create a new instance of an Appearance stream.
